title: Please Identify this font's name...
content:
Hello,

I'm trying to identify this font for 3days, yet have no match...  
Could you suggest what this font is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [title.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713205923/http:/typophile.com/files/title_1.jpg) | 13.14 KB |
author: Kano_fxstc

comments.content: This one is Padaloma Italic. I don't want to link to it because to me, it looks like a rip-off of [Compacta Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713205923/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/compacta-sb). Some letters has been edited (/d, /g...) and the result has been re-published under a different name. Alternative: [Loft](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713205923/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/loft)

I really thank you, Ryuk!! You're great!!  
I understand Compacta Black is the original.

Compacta designed by Fred Lambert 1963 wider versions added later.  
Don
